attributes.action: Give lottery funding and support to James Adamson to stop smoking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: James has a struggle with his smoking habit and his ritual morning Fag is driving him crazy. Unfortunately his love of classic cars and his continual strive to collect all barbie dolls ever released do not allow his financial capabilitys to stretch to hypnotism to assist. Please vote caringly.....

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
